程序包 view

类 GameUi

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
view.GameUi
所有已实现的接口:
ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, Accessible, RootPaneContainer, WindowConstants
public class GameUi extends JFrame
GameUi class representing the user interface for the Battleship game.
另请参阅:

    • showSplashScreen

      private void showSplashScreen(String imagePath, int duration)
      Displays a splash screen with the specified image for a specified duration.
      参数:
      imagePath - the path to the image file to be displayed
      duration - the duration in milliseconds for which the splash screen is displayed
